text: Realizing that he was being chased by a wolf, a little lamb decided to take refuge in a nearby temple. The wolf called him and told him that if the sacrificer found him in there, he would sacrifice him to his god. - Better this way! "I'd rather be a victim to a god than die in your teeth". If we're going to be sacrificed, it's better to be done with honor.
title: El lobo y el cordero en el templo
author: nan Esopo
